content: Delivered got, myself, into-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""I've got myself into a mess from a business acquisition in 2022 that I need to clean up and I am looking for a CPA/Tax Attorney. Here's an overview. Let me know if you are interested and if so how to proceed.Background:I live in Salt Lake City Utah and I acquired on 3/29/22 a Chicago company. The firm is fully remote and I run it from Utah.The acquisition was a stock acquisition which was to be treated as an asset sale under a 336(3) election.Here is how the acquisition went down.PP, LLC (41.9% John Doe, 57.0% James Doe, 1.1% Jane Doe) Was formed on 3/3/2023 and took a minority ownership of the Praedium Valuation, LLC.PV, LLC (95% (ME), 5% PP, LLC) was also formed on 3/3/2023.Both PP, LLC and PV, LLC (Origally set up to be taxed as a partnership) then acquired PF Inc on 3/29/2022 as a stock acquisition agreement to do a 336(e) election to treat it as an asset sale.PF, Inc was formed in 2001 and was/is an S-Corp and had an existing EIN number.Issues:1) A partnership cannot own an S-Corp. I paid a lot of money to the fairly large M&A firm that has tax attorney specialists that worked on this transaction that missed this.A) How do I resolve?I) Can I retroactively dissolve PP, LLC or make me the only entity on it retroactivly so that as a single member owner of the LLC's we are good?II) Is their alternative options that would be better. John, James, Jane are all family and willing to do whatever is easiest.2) The 2022 & 2023 Taxes have not been filed. We had an extension for PF, Inc but I forgot to do one for PV, LLC. Therefore I see no path to take the 336(3) Election. I know how ridiculous this is and it's embarrassing.I) With 2022 Filing do I take the 336(E) Election? Maybe provide an explanation of circumstancesII) Do I just forget about the 336(E) and treat the sale as if it were a stock sale for filings?II) Any other alternatives or paths I should take?3) Retaining the EIN was important going into the transaction. It's part of the reason for the stock sale. Now not necessarily the case.A) Do I want to or need to retain the EIN fro PF, Inc.B) If retaining it do I keep it with PF, Inc or associate it with PV, LLCC) What actions do I need to take with IRS regarding the EIN4) This acquisition lost $1M (35%+) in annual revenue potential at closing based on information that was not made available to me going into the transaction. That in addition to real estate transaction volume dropping significantly with Interest rates rising dramatically the business is failing. There are three paths in consideration. Plan A: Chapter 11 Sub IV bankruptcy, Plan B: An Article 9 short sale, Plan C: Close business and personal bankruptcy. For now please assume Plan A Sub IV is the path as it's the most likely and the current path I'm walking. The business debt is personally guaranteed by just me and PV, LLC and PF, Inc are also both liable for the business debt. While PF, Inc is registered in IL and PV, LLC registered in Utah. Long term corporate will always be Utah. For bankruptcy filing I want to file in Utah.A) How do I make sure I can file Sub IV in utah?I) Do I need to make any entity changes to do so?I know this is a lot. The priority is to file taxes. I feel like 1-3 need to be resolved to do that. Bankruptcy filing is likely to occur in 60-120 days so 4 above is relevant information to aid in 1-3 but it's lessor of a priority.Thank you for your time!Hourly Range: $75.00-$335.00Posted On: February 15, 2024 23:38 UTCCategory: Tax LawSkills:Accounting, CPA, Tax Preparation, Tax Law, Corporate TaxSkills: Accounting, CPA, Tax Preparation, Tax Law, Corporate TaxLocation Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.Country: United States""

content: Delivered business, flyer, printed-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""A business flyer is a printed or digital promotional material designed to convey key information about a business, its products, services, or events to a target audience. Here's a description of a typical business flyer:Title: [Business Name] Flyer**Front Side:**1. **Eye-catching Visual**: The front side of the flyer features a visually appealing image or graphic relevant to the business or its offerings. This could be a high-quality photograph, illustration, or graphic design element that grabs the viewer's attention and sets the tone for the flyer.2. **Compelling Headline**: A concise and attention-grabbing headline prominently displayed near the top of the flyer. The headline should succinctly communicate the main message or offer of the business, enticing the viewer to learn more.3. **Key Information**: Beneath the headline, the flyer includes essential information about the business, such as its name, logo, contact details (phone number, email address, website), and physical address (if applicable).4. **Benefits and Features**: A brief section highlighting the key benefits or features of the business, product, or service being promoted. This could include unique selling points, special offers, discounts, or other incentives to attract potential customers.5. **Call to Action (CTA)**: A clear and actionable CTA encouraging the viewer to take the next step, such as "Call Now," "Visit Our Website," "Shop Now," or "Learn More." The CTA is typically emphasized with bold text or a contrasting color to make it stand out.**Back Side:**1. **Detailed Information**: The back side of the flyer provides more detailed information about the business, its products, services, or upcoming events. This could include descriptions, features, pricing, testimonials, or any other relevant details that help potential customers make informed decisions.2. **Visual Continuity**: Continuation of the visual theme established on the front side of the flyer to maintain brand consistency and reinforce the overall message.3. **Contact Information**: Additional contact information, social media handles, or QR codes that allow viewers to easily connect with the business or access more information online.4. **Visual Hierarchy**: Organized layout with clear headings, bullet points, and subheadings to guide the reader's eye through the information and highlight key points effectively.5. **Branding Elements**: Incorporation of brand colors, fonts, logos, and other branding elements to reinforce brand identity and create a cohesive look and feel.Overall, a well-designed business flyer effectively captures the attention of its target audience, communicates key messages clearly and persuasively, and motivates viewers to take action, whether it's contacting the business, making a purchase, or attending an event.Budget: $5Posted On: February 22, 2024 23:56 UTCCategory: Graphic DesignSkills:Flyer DesignSkills: Flyer DesignCountry: India""

""I'm creating an automated system for creating photorealistic health supplement pouches as product shots that need to be rendered in three js,I have the blender models and meshes and some code and I am just looking for someone with experience to help me finish the project and work out the final steps.I will provide a github with the source I have so far and I am looking to hand over the files as reference for the job to be completed.The images for the front and back of the product are being set as decals that can be dynamically set via a url parameter. Specifically I need the lighting and shadows to be soft product shadows and the eventual imagery to be good enough to be used as a product shot in an Amazon or ebay listing. Performance can be sacrificed for quality of render.The shot must be set up by the user then a button would be available to capture the current frame of the canvas as an image.The project should be delivered in react / vite or whichever system you use. Specificallly using react-three/drei and GLB/GTLF meshes imported locally. The pouches must be filled with capsules or pills. I have created this already but happy for you to recreate this if you think there is an easier way to achieve this. In summary:- a react app using react-three/drei (i already have some working code)- a product shot of a filled pouch with soft shadows on a blank background with orbit controls- the contents of the pouch must be dynamically set via a url parameter (e.g ?contents=pills or ?contents=capsules)- dynamically set front and back png images, set with a url parameter (e.g. ?front=front_image.png&back=back.png)- the ability to use a button capture and save the canvas as an image with the resolution of 2000x2000Can you give me a price and an estimate of time for this work please? ""Seeking a Tech Wizard to Revolutionize Mental Health DocumentationHello Future App Developer Extraordinaire,I hope this message finds you well and ready for a thrilling challenge! I'll cut to the chase - we're on the lookout for a skilled app developer to partner with our mental health practice in a quest to conquer the time-consuming document mountain.Here's the scoop: our clinicians are drowning in paperwork, and we're yearning for an AI-powered lifeboat to rescue us. Picture this - an app that not only banks our interventions but also crafts simple, measurable objectives in the blink of an eye. We want our clinicians to input their thoughts, and voila! content: Delivered enhanced, logo, design-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Enhanced Logo Design Brief for "Enfant Terrible"Introduction to "Enfant Terrible":"Enfant Terrible" isn't just a name; it's a manifesto. We are a beacon for those who dare to disrupt the fashion industry with audacity and creativity. Our brand is a celebration of the rebels, the thinkers, and the dreamers who see fashion as more than clothing—it's a form of expression, a stand against conformity, and a dialogue with society.Our Essence:We thrive on the edge of innovation and rebellion, where bold expressions and unconventional creativity collide to challenge fashion norms. "Enfant Terrible" is about making statements that resonate, provoke thought, and spark conversation. Our designs are not just worn; they're experienced.Objective:We're searching for a logo that is as impactful and rebellious as our brand. This includes a captivating mascot logo—a 20-year-old boxer with a story told through scars and a demeanor that speaks volumes—and a striking wordmark that captures our avant-garde ethos.Mascot Logo Detailed Vision:The mascot should be a symbol of defiance and resilience, depicted through expressive line art that captures the spirit of a young boxer ready to challenge the world. His scar under one eye and buzzcut should reflect a narrative of survival and fighting spirit. This mascot isn’t just for "Enfant Terrible"; it's for our community that stands against creative conformity.Wordmark:The wordmark should embody the essence of our brand—bold, artistic, and unapologetically avant-garde. It needs to complement the mascot yet be strong enough to stand on its own across our fashion lines and branding materials.Creative Liberty:In addition to the boxer concept, we invite you to propose a second mascot concept. This is your canvas to interpret "Enfant Terrible" in a way you see fit. Impress us with your creativity.Design Preferences:Style: The mascot should be realized in a cartoon style with not to much detail but still capturing emotion and narrative. The wordmark should be distinct and memorable, embodying the brand's avant-garde personality.Color Palette: We entrust you with the color palette. Draw from the brand's essence of rebellion and avant-garde artistry. We're looking for something that makes a statement but remains versatile across various applications.Application:This logo will be our standard-bearer, appearing everywhere from digital domains like our website and social media to the tangible world of our clothing and promotional materials. It must be versatile, scalable, and iconic.Budget and Timeline:Budget: Allocated 200 to 400 euros. We view this as an investment in a partnership to bring the essence of "Enfant Terrible" to visual life.Timeline: Your expertise is valuable to us. Provide an estimated timeline based on the project's scope, ensuring quality and creativity are not compromised.Deliverables:Complete vector and raster files for both mascot and wordmark logos.A mini brand guide outlining the usage of logos, including the chosen color palette and any typography specifications.Selection Criteria:Demonstrated ability to craft narratives through design, with a portfolio that showcases expertise in line art and branding.Insightful interpretation of brand ethos into compelling visual stories.Effective communicator, ready for a collaborative creative process.Proposal Request:Kindly send your proposal, inclusive of your portfolio, estimated timeline, and quote.Posted On: February 19, 2024 13:27 UTCCategory: Logo DesignSkills:Logo Design, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Brand Identity & GuidelinesSkills: Logo Design, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Brand Identity & GuidelinesCountry: Netherlands""

content: Delivered biostatistics, help, needed-based improvements by transforming ad-hoc tasks into repeatable, automated processes that improved productivity and accuracy for clients.
original:
Improve this resume bullet:
""Biostatistics help needed (Urgent) for PhD Study on Cancer Treatment OutcomesAre you a skilled biostatistician with a passion for working with Cancer datasets? I'm urgently seeking an experienced individual to help me analyse my PhD research dataset of Repeated measures (Two time points).**Project Overview:**My PhD study focuses on understanding cancer treatment outcomes using repeated measures data collected at two time points. I need to analyze the data using mixed effects models to uncover insights into the effectiveness of different treatment modalities. I will provide a mock dataset for you to work on, so I can learn the R-code and apply it my dataset, using your help.**Key Responsibilities:**1. Organize Treatment Sequences: My dataset includes information on different treatment types, with the Start +End dates of treatments for each subject. The treatment sequences for each subject need to be organised chronologically .2. Apply mixed effects models to investigate propensity-weighted treatment outcomes.3. Implement Covariance structures to account for correlation between repeated measures.4. Utilize restricted maximum likelihood (REML) methods and associated correction methods for standard error estimation.5. Build covariate-adjusted mixed effects models, adjusting for various demographic and clinical factors.6. Compute and compare outcome measures at different time points and by treatment group.7. Provide step-by-step R code for each analysis step.**Qualifications:**- Master's or Ph.D. in Biostatistics, Statistics, or a related field.- Experience in analyzing repeated measures data using mixed effects models, preferable in cancer datasets- Proficiency in statistical software such as R, with the ability to provide R code for each analysis step.- Familiarity with methods for handling correlated data and mixed models.- Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively .**Duration and Location:**Due to PhD deadlines I need someone available as soon as possible. The dataset is cleaned and fairly straighforward . I've set a fixed price expecting ~6 hours of work, but this is flexible. There will be opportunities for long-term engagement based on project needs and your performance.**How to Apply:**If you're excited about contributing to cutting-edge research in cancer treatment outcomes and have the expertise to execute complex statistical analyses, I want to hear from you!Please submit your CV, along with a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and skills.If you have published any research papers ( author/co-author) involving LMM/REML methods, that would be fantastic ! Please send them to me.Budget: $500Posted On: February 19, 2024 03:26 UTCCategory: Data AnalyticsSkills:Regression Analysis, Biostatistics, R, Statistics, Data Analysis, Quantitative Analysis, Data ScienceSkills: Regression Analysis, Biostatistics, R, Statistics, Data Analysis, Quantitative Analysis, Data ScienceCountry: New Zealand""

So at this moment I would only want to know if the solution that I'm looking for is available and within budget.So I want to sell a table with the option of changing the tabletop design as well as the option to change the type of legs and than the color of those legs. Depending on the chosen variant of each. No this of course can be done with variable products in Woocommerce and that has worked fine for me as far as the price calculations and order process goes. But I also want the product image to reflect the right combination of options and colors. You could achieve this by setting a unique image for each of the possible variations, but with a lot of possible combinations (around 500 to 600 per table) this is no longer a workable option. So instead it would be great to have an option that let's me combine partially transparant layers of images for each variation option that get's combined in one image.I have the option to render images with a transparant background in WebP of all the "components", so for the separate table tops in different colors and finishes, and the legs, which are in available in different models and colors.One good thing to know is that the table top always needs to be in front of the image of the legs. So basically, there's always going to be a maximum of two images overlaying each other. First the legs, than the table top on top of that. And then depending on the selected model of the legs, and the color of the legs and table top, one of those images, or both of them need to change while keeping the tabletop image in front always.Although nice to have, It's not necessary to have the option to enlarge the product image or to let it pop-up in a lightbox or something like that.Posted On: February 19, 2024 11:37 UTCCategory: Ecommerce Website DevelopmentSkills:JavaScript, WooCommerce, CSSSkills: JavaScript, WooCommerce, CSSCountry: Netherlands""

Ulteriori dettagli saranno condivisi con i candidati selezionati per le interviste.Sei un individuo dinamico e motivato con una passione per il mondo delle vendite e della tecnologia? Sei alla ricerca di un’opportunità professionale in un ambiente stimolante e innovativo? Siamo alla ricerca di un Sales Assistant per unirsi al nostro team Vendite.Attività principali:• Supportare attivamente il team vendite nel mantenimento delle relazioni con i clienti e i lead indicati (no cold calls/telemarketing).• Gestire la comunicazione con i clienti e i lead tramite telefono, e-mail e altri canali di comunicazione, fornendo informazioni sul prodotto, rispondendo alle domande e assistendo nelle eventuali problematiche.• Supportare nella gestione del processo di vendita attraverso l'utilizzo di software CRM, mantenendo aggiornate le informazioni sui lead, le attività e le interazioni con i clienti e i lead.• Collaborare con le altre aree aziendali, per lo svolgimento delle attività assegnate.• Mantenere un'approfondita conoscenza del prodotto e delle sue funzionalità.Requisiti:• Diploma di scuola superiore o Laurea.• Esperienza precedente nel ruolo di Sales Assistant o in un ruolo di supporto alle vendite, preferibilmente nel settore tecnologico o digitale.• Eccellenti capacità comunicative e relazionali, con la capacità di instaurare rapporti positivi con i clienti.• Orientamento ai risultati e capacità dimostrate di lavorare verso obiettivi di vendita.• Capacità di lavorare in modo autonomo e in team, gestendo efficacemente le proprie attività e rispettando le scadenze.• Conoscenza degli strumenti informatici (es. suite Microsoft Office).Se sei pronto a fare la differenza in un'azienda in crescita inviaci la tua candidatura con una lettera motivazionale che illustri il tuo interesse e le tue qualifiche per questa posizione.Budget: $400Posted On: February 23, 2024 08:00 UTCCategory: Sales & Business DevelopmentSkills:Communications, Email Communication, Sales, Scheduling, Administrative SupportSkills: Communications, Email Communication, Sales, Scheduling, Administrative SupportCountry: Italy""
